article_title: GE Seeks to Raise $3.1 Billion in Synchrony IPO
article_text:
General Electric Co. Chief Executive Jeff Immelt's strategy to increase earnings from the conglomerate's industrial businesses while shrinking its financial operation showed signs of new traction in the latest quarter.

On Friday, GE reported a 13% rise in profit and a 3% increase in revenue on strong earnings from its jet engine and oil and gas equipment businesses. The company also kicked off its planned spinoff of its $20 billion...

twitter.description: GE said its profit rose 13% as the company pushed forward with its plans to refocus its business, including kicking off a road show for the initial public offering for its North American finance business.
twitter.creator: @TMannWSJ

image.alt: GE seeks to raise $3.1 billion in Synchrony IPO $GE

twitter.title: GE Seeks to Raise $3.1 Billion in Synchrony IPO
